text: tarapara amara sukrakitatike bana'i ekati raktapinda, tarapara raktapindake amara bana'i ekati mansera tala, tarapara mansera tale amara srsti kari haragora, tarapara haragorake amara dheke di'i mansapesi diye, tarapare amara take parinata kari an'ya eka srstite. Se'ijan'ya allahâ€Œra'i apara mahima, kata srestha e'i srasta
